remarks: The predicate "is a monoid".  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ismndo.1 $e |- X = dom dom G $.
ismndo $p |- ( G e. A -> ( G e. MndOp <-> ( G e. SemiGrp /\ E. x e. X A. y e. X ( ( x G y ) = y /\ ( y G x ) = y ) ) ) ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
